Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.weaponry.effects

Class Damage

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.model.weaponry.effects.Effect
      • it.polimi.ingsw.model.weaponry.effects.OffensiveEffect
        • it.polimi.ingsw.model.weaponry.effects.Damage
  • public class Damage
extends OffensiveEffect
    Damage is an Effect inflicted to a Player that reduces their health and enables adrenaline actions above certain thresholds.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class it.polimi.ingsw.model.weaponry.effects.OffensiveEffect

      This is the only constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void apply()
      Sets up a Damage to be applied, by elaborating the valid Target list and checking if the attacker can use Scopes to increase the Damage amount to some of their Targets.
      void applyAfterScopes​(java.util.List<Player> targets, java.util.List<Player> scopedPlayers)
      Effectively applies the Damage taking into accounts the base Targets and the Targets on whom the attacker also used one or more Scopes.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Creates a short description of the effect.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Damage

        Damage​(int amount,
       java.util.List<Constraint> constraints)
        This is the only constructor.
        Parameters:
        amount - the amount of health points the Damage takes.
        constraints - the requirements each Target needs to meet in order to be affected.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public void apply()
        Sets up a Damage to be applied, by elaborating the valid Target list and checking if the attacker can use Scopes to increase the Damage amount to some of their Targets.
        Specified by:
        apply in class Effect

      • applyAfterScopes

        public void applyAfterScopes​(java.util.List<Player> targets,
                             java.util.List<Player> scopedPlayers)
        Effectively applies the Damage taking into accounts the base Targets and the Targets on whom the attacker also used one or more Scopes.
        Parameters:
        targets - the base Targets - merely all those who meet all of the Constraints.
        scopedPlayers - the scoped Players.

      • toString

        Creates a short description of the effect.

        the description.
